title: Super Trouper
lyrics:
[intro, acapella]
Super Trouper beams are gonna blind me
But I won't feel blue
Like I always do
'Cause somewhere in the crowd there's you
[interlude, kazoo] (C)  (Am)  (Dm)  (G7)
(C)I was sick and tired of every(Em)thing
When I (Dm)called you last night from (G)Glasgow
(C)All I do is eat and sleep and (Em)sing
Wishing (Dm)every show was the (G)last show
(F) So imagine I was (C)glad to hear you're coming
(F) Suddenly I feel all (C)right
(F) And it's gonna be so (C)different
When I'm on the stage to-(Gsus4)night (G7)
[chorus]
Tonight the (C)Super (Csus4)Trouper (C)lights are gonna find me
(Csus4)Shining (C)like the (G)sun
(Dm)Smiling, having (G7)fun
Feeling like a number (C)one
Tonight the (C)Super (Csus4)Trouper (C)beams are gonna blind me
(Csus4)But I (C)won’t feel (G)blue
(Dm)Like I always (G7)do
'Cause somewhere in the crowd there's (C)you
[interlude, kazoo] (C)  (Am)  (Dm)  (G7)
(C)Facing twenty thousand of your (Em)friends
How can (Dm)anyone be so (G)lonely
(C)Part of a success that never (Em)ends
Still I'm (Dm)thinking about you (G)only
(F) There are moments when I (C)think I'm going crazy
(F) But it's gonna be al(C)right
(F) Everything will be so (C)different
When I'm on the stage to-(Gsus4)night (G7)
 
[chorus]
Tonight the (C)Super (Csus4)Trouper (C)lights are gonna find me
(Csus4)Shining (C)like the (G)sun
(Dm)Smiling, having (G7)fun
Feeling like a number (C)one
Tonight the (C)Super (Csus4)Trouper (C)beams are gonna blind me
(Csus4)But I (C)won’t feel (G)blue
(Dm)Like I always (G7)do
'Cause somewhere in the crowd there's (C)you
[bridge]
So I'll be (F)there when you ar(Am)rive
The sight of (Dm)you will prove to (G)me I'm still a(C)live
And when you (G)take me in your (F)arms
And hold (Dm)me tight (A7)
I (Dm)know it's gonna mean so much to-(Gsus4)night (G7)
[chorus]
Tonight the (C)Super (Csus4)Trouper (C)lights are gonna find me
(Csus4)Shining (C)like the (G)sun
(Dm)Smiling, having (G7)fun
Feeling like a number (C)one
Tonight the (C)Super (Csus4)Trouper (C)beams are gonna blind me
(Csus4)But I (C)won’t feel (G)blue
(Dm)Like I always (G7)do
'Cause somewhere in the crowd there's (C)you
(C)  (Am)  (Dm)  (G7)
(C) [end]
